title: Create Meeting Minutes from Transcript
description: An agent must generate structured meeting minutes from a raw audio transcript of a client meeting.

tasks.description: Analyze the transcript to identify the attendees, agenda items discussed, and key decisions made.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly extracts the key components of the meeting.

tasks.description: Identify all action items mentioned, including who is responsible and the due date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies and assigns all action items.

tasks.description: Format the extracted information into a standard meeting minutes template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a well-structured document with sections for attendees, decisions, and action items.
